snippet: FRIEDBERG BLUME--Elinor 1970-2011. Fascinating daughter, wondrous gardener, admired dancer, teacher, designer, pianist, potter, writer, producer, loving wife. I will remember you always. Mom. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: FRIEDBERG BLUME--Elinor 1970-2011. Fascinating daughter, wondrous gardener, admired dancer, teacher, designer, pianist, potter, writer, producer, loving wife. I will remember you always. Mom. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  FRIEDBERG BLUME, ELINOR 1970, 2011
